Text: Congrat's man, and thanks for all the wonderful music you have brought us. Oh by the way, one of my fave's too----cheers
Thanks Maestro,1000 uploads and still going strong!Shame that so few say thanks for all your hard work,but that´s life I suppose.Heres to the 1000.As you say peace brother:)

don't do it for the thanks :-) even know it's nice from time to time to know that folks are being turned onto or finding an old friend in the tunes I share - 'SHARE THE MUSIC' is my creed ~ gratitude is something I practice ~ peace is the way I live ~
